name: Love Crusher-Teddy Bear Smasher
description:
Valentines, hearts, teddies, rainbows... It´s time to save the world from a love apocalypse. Crush the cute teddy bears! But avoid hearts, or you'll be doomed.

Are you bored of sweet cute teddies and rainbows? Now you can smash them!
You only need one finger!

Tap to fly up. Pick batteries to recharge energy, and avoid hearts, or you will be destroyed.
Make combos to get the highest score!

Game features:
- Simple one touch game play.
- Smash teddy bears!
- No in-app purchases.
- Kill Teddies!
- Share your Scores!
- Did I say exterminate teddy bears?
